caption.p: Observed epidemic cases and ratio of infections transmitted from other jurisdictions to infections within each jurisdiction. The weekly number of reported cases per sentinel (bar plot), the lower 95% credible interval limit of the effective reproduction number ( R t) (95% CIL) (orange line) and the ratio of the expected value of daily cases of infection transmitted from other jurisdictions to that of infection within each jurisdiction (green line) are shown. The situations in Miyazaki city, Chuo, Miyakonojo, Nobeoka, Nichinan, Kobayashi, Takanabe, Takachiho, and Hyuga are shown in ( aâ€“ i), respectively.
